com.asemantics.rdfcoder.model.ontology

Interface Ontology

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseOntology, DefaultOntology, JavaOntology

    public interface Ontology
    Defines the ontology generated by a JavaCodeHandler

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Ontology.ListBounds
      Declares the restriction bounds for an array.
